mapper.insert: insert into orderHistory (num, userid, phone_name, phone_model_num, sprice, scolor, samount, sImage, orderName , post1, post2, addr1, addr2, phone, payMethod) values(#{num},#{userid},#{phone_name},#{phone_model_num},#{sprice},#{scolor}, #{samount},#{sImage},#{orderName},#{post1}, #{post2},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{phone},#{payMethod})
